mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_name, serial_num, type, discount, price, add_time, expire_time, comment, product_url) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{discount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update product
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_num = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_url = #{productUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update product set product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_num = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_url = #{productUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
